[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [PROCEDURE\_CATEGORY\_NAME](./blockly.procedure_category_name_variable.md)

## PROCEDURE\_CATEGORY\_NAME variable

String for use in the "custom" attribute of a category in toolbox XML. This string indicates that the category should be dynamically populated with procedure blocks.

**Signature:**

```typescript
PROCEDURE_CATEGORY_NAME: string
```
